title: Cognitive psychologists are most likely to study

content.question: Cognitive psychologists are most likely to study which of the following?

choices.label: the acquisition of knowledge, planning, and problem solving
how infants move from basic trust to autonomy
the conflicts of the conscious and the unconscious
how survival processes vary across cultures

content.answer: the acquisition of knowledge, planning, and problem solving

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
